description: This option allows modifying the startup arguments and other details to run a custom SRCDS based game on the panel.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# SRCDS Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt install -y --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests wget lib32gcc1 ca-certificates

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
wget -qO- 'https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz' | tar xzf -

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} +quit

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so
